title: EastEnders spoilers: Jay is rocked by a sudden death
text:
Jay Brown (Jamie Borthwick) has spent the last several years in EastEnders helping those in mourning plan the funeral of a recently deceased relative — much like he did with Mel Owen (Tamzin Outhwaite) when she lost her son Hunter (Charlie Winter) — but, this time, it’s he who will have to deal with a sudden death — and he’s left devastated as a result.

In the coming episodes, Jay makes plans to have a day out with Lola (Danielle Harold) and Lexi. However, these plans are soon scuppered where he gets a new booking at work. To make matters worse, this booking ain’t no ordinary booking either, and both Jay and Callum (Tony Clay) are amazed at the scale of the funeral that’s been requested.

The real shock comes later, as Jay learns of who’s funeral it is that he’ll be arranging — and he’s left reeling as a result. Yes, the service is for Terry Bates — the man responsible for his father Jase’s (Stephen Lord) death.

Upon seeing Jay’s disdain for Terry first-hand, Callum asks Ben (Max Bowden) for help. Meanwhile Lola comforts Jay.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Later in the week, Lola informs Billy (Perry Fenwick) about what’s transpired, which leads to Jay having an emotional heart-to-heart with him.

This discovery will no doubt bring back bad memories for Jay, who lost his dad as a result of the villainous Terry’s actions back in 2008.

One to watch: Tuesday 22nd October at 7:30pm on BBC One.

description: Jay's left reeling as a result.
